title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat the eggs with most of the cheese and a pinch of pepper.
Drain pasta, reserve a little cooking water.
Quickly toss spaghetti with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture off the heat.
Add reserved water if needed to make a silky sauce. Serve with remaining cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or sear chicken pieces until cooked through.
Sauté onion until soft, add tomatoes and simmer.
Stir in cream and add the cooked chicken, warm through.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and delicious—mashed avocado on toasted sourdough with a squeeze of lemon.
steps: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Spread the mash over toast and sprinkle chili flakes if desired.
